ygData.msgSnippet: Phobia walks with the Maximals, (I assume  he s in the middle.) The Cybertronian Fire s your ship? such a shame that your ship had to crash, the scans I took

Phobia walks with the Maximals, (I assume  he's in the middle.) The 
Cybertronian Fire's your ship? such a shame that your ship had to 
crash, the scans I took showed it to be a rather formidable ship, I 
was impressed. Is there any chance it will fly again?"

Phobia didn't expect much of an answer to his question. He was after 
all a Predicon, the natural enemy of the Maximals. A good leader 
didn't devulge any tactical information to the enemy. If he did tell 
the details then Phobia knew he wasn't leaving while he was 
functional.

(Sorry about the control thing, I was in a hurry and didn't have time 
to wait for details over a small thing.)

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Please do not controll other charaters in the future, Cyberwolf. 
I'll let 
> this pass, but be more careful.
> 
> ::Kluster::
> 
> Kluster looks from Phobia to Savanah. "I am Kluster, commander of 
the Maximal 
> battle cruiser The Cybertronian Fire. These two are also Maximals, 
Hysteria 
> and Blur."
> 
> He turns around, motioning all four of the bots behind him to 
follow. "Let's 
> get back to my ship. We can talk there."
